text: Ojise naa (sollalahu 'alayhi wa sallam) gbagbo ninu ohun ti won sokale fun un lati odo Oluwa re. Awon onigbagbo ododo naa (gbagbo ninu re). Eni kookan (won) gbagbo ninu Allahu, awon molaika Re, awon Tira Re ati awon Ojise Re. A ko ya eni kan soto ninu awon Ojise Re. Won si so pe: “A gbo (ase), a si tele (ase). A n toro aforijin Re, Oluwa wa. Odo Re si ni abo eda.”
